alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 11:59PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS AND NORTHWESTERN CARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM CDT... At 1159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Cromwell, or 16 miles east of Big Sandy Lake, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Floodwood, Brookston, Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area, and Gowan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
